title: Osho_Vigyan_Bhairav_Tantra_Vol2-English original.pdf
description:
This is vol2 of 2-volume Boxed set
An in-depth and practical explanation by Osho, of the 112 meditation techniques of Shiva, on which the science of Tantra is based.
The original series of 80 discourses were simply called "Vigyan Bhairav Tantra".
Time of talks: Oct 1, 1972 to Nov 8, 1973 , Mumbai
2-Volume Boxed Set with 112-Meditation Cards Deck
For publication as books they were divided up into 5 volumes, called the The Book of the Secrets, Volume 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 (16 discourses each).
Later published as a single volume The Book of Secrets
